description:
Whether you have suffered a personal injury or have been arrested on criminal charges in Voorhees, New Jersey, your rights are at stake. At Garber Law, we have a team of experienced trial attorneys who are prepared to protect your best interests. We know that everyone’s case is unique, which is why we devote personal attention to every client we serve.

Our law offices provide a number of legal services, including representation for personal injury, criminal law, employment law and workers’ compensation cases. Although each of these issues is different, we remain constant in our commitment to your goals. During a free initial consultation, we will take the time to understand your situation. From there, we collaborate to put together a compelling strategy that targets the best possible outcome.

Since 1986, our law offices have had success throughout South Jersey. Our attorneys have helped thousands of people recover compensation following a personal injury. We are committed to protecting your rights in the short term and looking ahead to mitigate the risk of future issues. No matter what your case entails, you can count on Garber Law to explain your options and act as a constant source of support throughout every phase of the process. For your convenience, we accept credit cards.
